content:
I have a puzzle for you! In the code block below, there is a word missing. Can you figure out what the missing word is? It's a five-letter word that starts with the letter "j" and is equivalent to "leap", "hop", "bound", "vault", and "spring". Once you have identified the missing word, can you also give me an antonym for it? Get your thinking cap on and let's see if you can solve this puzzle!
{
  "word": "__",
  "synonyms": [
    "leap",
    "hop",
    "bound",
    "vault",
    "spring"
  ]
}

The missing word in the code block is "jump." It fits well as a synonym for "leap," "hop," "bound," "vault," and "spring." 

An antonym for "jump" would be "fall."
